long_description: The Inova STS Headlamp makes brilliant hands-free illumination simple, versatile and comfortable. It features an innovative Swipe-To-Shine interface that allows for simple access to multiple modes. Swipe-To-Shine interface lets you switch modes with a simple swipe of your finger so you can find the light output you need quickly and easily. 1 white high-power LED operates in high, variable dim, medium and strobe; outputs 142 lumens and throws light up to 84m on high. 2 red LEDs preserve your night vision and can be operated in high, variable dim, medium and strobe. 3 AAA alkaline batteries (included) provide up to 4 hrs. 40 min. of use on high and 255 hrs. on low. Impact-resistant polycarbonate body. Fully programmed lock-out mode prevents accidental activation when the Inova STS Headlamp is in your backpack. High-quality woven elastic strap fits securely on your head.
short_description: The Inova STS Headlamp makes brilliant hands-free illumination simple, versatile and comfortable. It features an innovative Swipe-To-Shine interface that allows for simple access to multiple modes.
